https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9HETydFhAB5EuT7LQh4cg00dfon.jpg A rapid time-lapse journey from the London Houses of Parliament to the English Channel near the port of Dover is offset by David Cunningham’s musical score composed from fragments of Margaret Thatcher’s Belgrano speech.
